website_summaries.verdict: While the SoundLink Bluetooth Mobile Speaker II may no longer be in a class by itself, it's still near the top of the portable Bluetooth speaker category.
pros: For such a small, portable Bluetooth speaker, the Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Mobile Speaker II sounds great and plays impressively loud without distorting
It also has a built-in rechargeable battery, an auxiliary input, a rugged design, and the option to swap out protective covers (one of which is included)
cons: The speaker is somewhat pricey and has no speakerphone capabilities
Also, its battery life could be a little better

customer_reviews.title: Carefully, used product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product like 5 days ago. And there was some dirt on the front panel and it was bothering me. I was not aware that this is used product, I did not see it information on the product page, so I found this dirt suspicious and disassemble the product. And it was in very pour condition inside. Dust, hair and rust. Think twice before buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Olexander

customer_reviews.title: Has changed my life with quality amazing sound! It seems impossible this small box can ...
customer_reviews.text: Has changed my life with quality amazing sound! It seems impossible this small box can make such a big sound. I hear the new model is lacking features and this one is the better. It folds closed with an nice cover you will need the new don't. Sounds the same as the new. Only gripe is if you leave it on all day by accident aux mode it will NEVER ever turn off it self???? In Bluetooth it will go off by it self eventually. Fix this boys.
customer_reviews.author: djdaveq`

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT SO MUCH
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT SO MUCH! It is absolutely perfect. I carry it with me everywhere. It's so loud that you don't need anything else. I've used at home, on the beach, at the pool, etc. It's like a party that fits in your backpack. The bluetooth is very strong. This product also stays charged for HOURS and sometimes DAYS at a time. It's so durable and not too heavy. I would buy ten more of these to gift if i had the money. ABSOLUTELY GREAT!! THANK YOU!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Lybrand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speaker
customer_reviews.text: After researching for days the available blue tooth speakers on the market, I decided to purchase the Bose. I received the Bose Soundlink II today....... AND I Love it! Great sound. Expensive speaker, however it's a Bose, and I am pleased!!! I had no problem pairing my IPad and IPhone to the speaker, only took a few seconds. :)
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Chip your pets
customer_reviews.text: Got it used and speakers blown out and should have never been sold. Not a good seller for amazon prime, but it’s a billionaires world we buy from and he doesn’t care!
customer_reviews.author: ANIMAL.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is an easily used device. It has great range for connecting Bluetooth and is easily paired with more than one device, although to do so can cause conflicts as to which device is connected at any given time. The sound, as per usual with Bose, is great for the size of the unit. It's a great grab and go for travel and use outside of the home.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to use during our strength training classes we put on outside at parks. We connect using our bluetooth on the iPhone. The sound quality is nice and loud. The speaker is even better sounding inside a room, but it definitely works well outside for our purposes. It was very easy to pair with our iPhones and the charge on the battery lasts several days of use with just a couple of hours a day. I really like the integrated cover which really makes this a winner for me over the Jambox. It is so very easy to carry. I'm very pleased overall with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garza

customer_reviews.title: terrific little sound system!
customer_reviews.text: I owned the original model of this speaker system for a year and just received this updated version. The small design tweaks are nice (particularly the volume and bass, which now sounds richer and louder when played outdoors, as we'll as the cover, which now folds in the middle, allowing the speakers to be played from inside a backpack). I did extensive comparisons of this system versus the JamBox and ultimately determined this to be the superior system. It's pricey, but you get what you pay for. If you want portable, high quality sound, you won't be disappointed by this champ.
customer_reviews.author: David Massie

customer_reviews.title: Bose Speaks For Itself
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and obviously Bose speaks for itself. This was in excellent condition even though it was a used product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: All Fun N' Games

customer_reviews.title: Do you need a remote?
customer_reviews.text: This was my only concern. Your iPhone is the remote. You can control the volume and song selection from your phone. I bought this quickly before a vacation to Colorado for entertainment for the kids...and adults! What a great choice. It was plenty loud for the 14 of us outside singing and dancing. So loud that my husband was concerned we would disturb a campground across a river and 1/2 mile away. It is a great purchase and I have yet after 5-6 hrs play time to run out of a charge. We have already made great memories having this very portable speaker. It connects easily and switches e tween devices.
customer_reviews.author: Woodywaves

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for home and travel.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounds amazing. Set up is simple. And the portability is great. I bought this speaker to give the market more time to advance the wireless wifi home speaker systems that fell short of my expectations. This speakers portability and quality will always make it an essential item for any kind of listeners. IMO, the quality of the vinyl cover looks and feels better than the leather so you can save a couple bucks. Best part,its loud enough to drown out the screaming kids and wife that I previously was only able to do when in the car. Peace at last!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CTC383

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I use it with my computer. I use it with my iPhone. Whatever bluetooth device I have - I can sync it to this speaker. It is portable and sounds great. I usually keep it plugged in but it works for quite a while unplugged. This has replaced my stereo system. I just play my Pandora radio from my iPhone. I also use it to watch and do yoga online. I just sync it to my laptop. It really makes everything sound great. I would definitely invest in the larger more expensive model, the next time, but this one is perfect. I am sold on Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate
customer_reviews.text: Bought because I experienced the quality of sound and convenience this product provided, unfortunately product received did not meet my needs- failed to hold charge thus returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed.. best sound easy connection
customer_reviews.text: I tested many bluetooth speakers.. at the store and at home..This is the best.. IMHO. I actually bought the Sony version and later decided to upgrade to the Bose..it was a big jump, but worth it. You will only buy this once in your life (becasue it is so well built) so buy the best. The Bluetooth pairup to the iPhone 5s was as easy as it could be and worked from 50 feet away. The sound is amaxing. What you don't see is that the cover folds under and becomes part of the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny-n-Warm

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for Valentine's Day after noticing that she was just listening to the sound from her iPad while getting ready in the morning. And while neither one of us are audiophiles the sound out of the tiny iPad speaker just doesn't cut it. I don't think we'll travel with this speaker too much but it is pretty light and small enough to travel with. My wife leaves it plugged in and "beams" her music from her iPad or iPod Touch to the speaker and it fills the bedroom with great sound. I agree with others it's a little expensive but to my unprofessional ear it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lance C. Rigdon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has punch and clarity! Alot of bass was biggest surprise. Top BOSE quality. Will also work nice for camping. My 4th purchase of BOSE products, and my truck has BOSE too :) You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: bigtrukgurl

customer_reviews.title: Music on the go
customer_reviews.text: I like this Bose Sound Link Mobile speaker especially because you can take it anywhere you go.The sound quality is superb. Only 4 stars because battery life is not as long as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Anndl

customer_reviews.title: A little over priced
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars, but dangit Bose is too pricey. It's very nice, it works well, it's cool...it's Bose, but I think I paid $299. Call me shallow but if a no name is over $200 I'll go with Bose if it's within another $100 just assuming at the end of the day it's better and will last longer. If money isn't a huge deal breaker then you'll be happy. Sound is really nice out of something so small and we move it all over the house on the go. Take it with us here and there.
customer_reviews.author: DCarnahan

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality if fine, but this product has the worst Blue Tooth ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality if fine, but this product has the worst Blue Tooth connectivity issues I have ever experienced. I have no problem at all connecting Blue Tooth devices to any of my android or Apple products, with the sole exception of this device. It ALWAYS takes two or three tries, requires rebooting, cleaning of its device memory, turning on and off, or something of the sort. Simply shameful.
customer_reviews.author: TexasCyclistg

customer_reviews.title: Great surround to hear music.
customer_reviews.text: I like the speaker but only one think that it has 2 scratches but is great surround when you hear the music.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance for a compact size
customer_reviews.text: I now have the soundlink 2, the Logitech V20's & the Logitec UE Boombox. All have their advantages.I like the Soundlink 2 because of it's quality sound, compact size & of course, bluetooth! It's great to travel with & I travel every second week. If you can compromise on size, then I'd choose the Logitech UE Boombox. Bluetooth, bigger, excellent build quality, richer more colourful sound & cheaper. If you're looking for value in a USB powered speaker with incredible sound, great separation & a bulletproof carrying case to boot, then the V20s are a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: kbubs

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Just a simple review here. I had this nice little BT speaker (Monster) that just wasn't loud enough. It was like $60 or so. I figured for $150 I could get something about the same concept and bigger/louder. Well, doesn't seem there is a lot of middle ground so I sucked it up and paid the $300 to buy this Bose. Man, it is nice. The bass is bigger and richer than it's small-ish size would indicate (it's about the same size as 3 saltine cracker packs stacked.) Paired right up with my Galazy II phone, no problems. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received my. Set up was less than 3 minutes. Using the iPhone as my source was as simple as it gets. Played a few different songs and then adjusted the equalizer on the Music portion of controls on the iPhone to find the sound spectrum I prefer. The richness and fullness of the sound this speaker produces are simply amazing. You really cannot go wrong with this as a portable wireless speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: but the Soundlink II is a well made Bluetooth speaker with awesome sound. I spent a lot of time comparing ...
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of choices for this type of speaker, but the Soundlink II is a well made Bluetooth speaker with awesome sound. I spent a lot of time comparing them, and it blows away everything that's less expensive and is equal in quality to everything that's more expensive. I know newer versions are being released all the time, but that's to be expected with tech. This one was a winner when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by the great sound of this speaker--especially the base response. Setup was easy, Bluetooth being immediately detected by my Mac laptop. After 10 days of enjoyment it just suddenly stopped recognizing any of my devices via Bluetooth. I troubleshooted via the Bose website and their live chat---to no avail. I returned it to Amazon and they shipped me a new one at no cost to me---excellent return policy, thank you! The new one works great. I give 4 stars because of the lemon I received. Keep your product boxes in case you have a problem similar to mine!
customer_reviews.author: bandito

customer_reviews.title: Great Device! Worth the Investment.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device and exactly what I was looking for. It's very well constructed and I don't really have any complaints. Just be sure to position the speaker as recommended (several inches in front of a wall or other solid structure; facing the listener) to ensure the best possible sound quality. One final note: this speaker features classic Bose "no nonsense" styling, which I personally like and appreciate. But, this could be a slight sticking point for others. That being said, I believe the company offers an assortment of colorful covers, which are available as an accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Portable Bluetooth Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I also have the Logitech wireless boom box, and the Bose SoundLink II is superior. Not that the Logitech is bad, it simply cannot fill a room with deep, rich sound like the Bose. I have used it with my iPad and assorted MacBooks. It handles the tremendous frequency and dynamic range of classical music with ease. I would not hesitate to buy it again and recommend it to others. Considering its compact size, it is a true electronic marvel, and further demonstrates the genius of Bose.
customer_reviews.author: MKilar

customer_reviews.title: Best sound
customer_reviews.text: Quality product as expected from Bose. This small speaker packs a mighty punch and it's nicely portable, sleek in design and just has great sound. We use this daily with our ipad for Pandora and tv watching and it's great. Easy to use and to link up to different devices plus it has the aux capability which we used with our portable projector as well. A really good buy and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker for my wife for Christmas to use in the summer outside and in the garage when she works her hobby - mosaics. It has been on frequently in the house simply because she loves it. The tone is rich and sonorous, and even at low volume it fills the family room and kitchen with music. We think that the estimate of battery life may be conservative. It seems to play for a few days before it needs recharging.
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Hottle

customer_reviews.title: bose soundlink 2
customer_reviews.text: My recent purchase of the Bose Soundlink 2 has surpassed my expectations. After reviewing many similar items online, as well as in retail stores, I chose this unit from Amazon, and I could not be more satisfied. It was shipped free and very fast. Having taught public school music and teaching guitar and voice for many years, I feel my concept of quality sound is at least as good as most. Realizing sound is a totally subjective thing, I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for BF. He loves it, however I'm only giving this 4 stars because the one we ordered from Amazon stopped working after about 3 weeks. The red light started flashing and wouldn't stop no matter what. Luckily we have a Bose service center not too far away. They said the item was defective, but they honored the Amazon receipt and gave him a brand new one. So far so good, but it might be a gamble if you don't have anywhere nearby to get this fixed under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: QualityBrands

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great, Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds great. Its got big sound for its size. We use this at the beach, pool, jacuzzi, in the kitchen, living room, bedroom, bathroom, garage, everywhere. Its a bit heavy, but I would expect that for its rugged design, big sound, and battery life. It lasts about 4-5 hours at a decent volume outside, but much longer inside since it does not need to be as loud. Its small brick shape makes it easy to stow in a backpack or beach bag, or just wrap up in your towel.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a live orchestra!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Bose....best sound ever and such a versatile speaker!! I can carry it around and get great sound anywhere! It always connects and works consistently. So long wiring!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah I.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I picked this unit up after reading a million reviews, and was not disappointed. I know they've since come out with the Soundlink Mini, which some have said puts out comparable sound for a lesser price, but I'm still happy with my purchase. I'm a big music buff and wanted the best, and this is it. It's PERFECT for outside on the deck while chillin or grillin, great to take on trips (camping, picnics, etc) and even when moving from room to room at home. I grab this baby from the living room and move it to the kitchen when cooking or doing the dishes, and it's great sound everywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: NW Local Longshanks

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a neat small package.
customer_reviews.text: Take it outside every when I use the Hot Tub. Connect the blur tooth to my phone and all the music in my cloud account is at me finger tips. I am not an "Audifile", but I do know a full range of sound when I hear it. This little unit is better than many much bigger units. No need to turn up the volume to get all the sound. From Big band music of the 40s, to the Mozart you get the full effect of the music.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a JBL wireless charging speaker for my Lumia 920, but it sounded horrible and cost just as much as this unit. I am not disappointed, I will just have to go without the wireless charging that the JBL had, but the sound quality more than makes up for that minor inconvenience. Don't waste your money on JBL or Beats bluetooth speakers... If you want quality this is the way to go, and is still in the same price range. It's also portable and rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect to your Apple products. Both my IPad and ITouch connected right away once the device started the seeking process. Sound and amplitude are great. Also, it recharges quickly and lasts fairly long on a charge. I have never run out of "juice" but usually connect the charger after a couple hours of use, if disconnected. I was also pleased I could use this as a speaker for my bedroom TV connecting it to the headphone out on the TV, and the Aux. In connection on the Soundlink. You use the type connection you use for playing your phone on your car radio speaker. I believe that is a 3.5mm male connectors which are available just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Graber

customer_reviews.title: Bose Soundlink Bluetooth Mobile Speaker II
customer_reviews.text: If you like to listen to music, this is a versatile, go anywhere audio device for your iPad or iPhone. Given the bluetooth connection, you can take the devices anywhere and play your recorded (i.e. iTunes) music. If you have Wifi, you can connect with Pandora or any of the other internet music programs. The sound quality is acceptable...not awesome, but a great improvement over you device speakers. The downside is that it can become disconnected to your device. Reconnecting requires some know-how that the Bose makers did not include in the manual.. A call to Bose support fixed the problem quickly, but they need to put the word out since this can happen on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Bose Sound Link
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to accept and remember 3 different Bluetooth inputs, but it does not, and the connections are very hard to do as I must forget the device and re-pair every time I want to reconnect a device. Then it stopped accepting music from my iPad, it now comes in bursts rather than being continuous. It seemed to work well after I bought it, but now it is a hot mess. Nobody at Bose has be of any help. Not very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. Big sound like big speakers. Good bass despite small size. Instructions tell you to set it against a wall. Do this. It makes all the difference. If you cannot, don't buy the speaker. Bluetooth connection works great. I use it with both my cell phone & tablet to listen to Pandora. After a brief, easy setup, connection is automatic. A Battery is built in. I usually use it plugged in, but sometimes I want to spend a few hours in another room. It's very light and I simply carry it away. I have not tested battery life, but it exceeds 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Barre

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I know Bose has a great reputation so I purchased this speaker to use on vacation at the pool and for my home. I am very happy with the quality of sound and the speaker can be very loud which I love. Easy to sync by iPhone to they speakers. My iMac was a little more difficult but that may be due to I'm new to this type of system. Highly recommend. I use the speaker every night to play a 'rain' sound while I sleep. I have not had any problems to date with the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lor Lor

customer_reviews.title: We are very disappointed in the sound compared to our older version
customer_reviews.text: We had an older version of the Bose speaker, similar to this one, but curved and for the iphone only (no bluetooth). We needed a new one since the latest iphone diddn't fit in the port. We are very disappointed in the sound compared to our older version. It sounds like a louder version of our phone speakers. Not good bass sound and not what we expect for the price and company. We are thinking of returning, but unfortunately threw the box and receipts away never thinking bose wouldn't produce a high quality product. Otherwise, battery life is good, charges well and keeps its promise in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got the Soundlink yesterday and I'm already in love. Paired it with both my cell and my laptop and the sound quality is amazing. I want to go through my entire library and listen to every song--it feels like I'm listening to them again for the first time. Yeah, it's that good. The sound is so clear and deep without being fuzzy or muddy. I wasn't so sure that it would be worth the price--we all know that Bose systems are rather expensive. But I'd say it's totally worth it, and you won't regret the extra money being spent on this quality speaker set.
customer_reviews.author: notmynickname76

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound, Little Package!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This little thing produces unbelievable sound. Believe the hype! This is not a little rinky dink system. The Bose SoundLink Moble II is small yet feels like a lead weight. Commercial grade mobile speaker for all the blue teeth in the house. The system has a great range. My phone serves as a remote control from over 20 feet away. The bass thumps and the quality is as good as live music. Worth the $$$. Last mobile I'll buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Sound is killer
customer_reviews.text: So amazing. made my year so far, I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I had read all the reviews on-line about the Bose SoundLink II vs. the Jawbone BIG JAMBOX and so I decided to buy both and compare the sound for myself. The Bose won hands down every time playing any genre of music. I found it to be an exceptional system, at least for my taste... at a great price-point. This unit connects to my iPhone via Bluetooth every time flawlessly as I stream music from Pandora, etc. The battery life is good as well. Considering the small size of this unit, it gives you an awesome sound at any volume. So it gets 5 stars in my book !
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality works flawlessly.  It's Bose!
customer_reviews.text: Compact with plent of volume for entertainment or quiet enjoyment. Bose quality thoughout. I use mine mostly wityh my IPad and play Pandora out on my patio. I hav experimented and connected it to other Bluetooth devises as well. You can connect up to 6 Blue tooth devises and it remembers the last one that was used. Great sound! Did I mention how great it sounds. Costs more than other bands, but is more practical for more uses, and it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Someonemysterious

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Bose Wave Radio, playing all night long (8 hours/day) for more than 10 years and it still sounds great and works like new. Therefore, I had some high expectations for the SoundLink Mobile Speaker II. This amazing little unit surpassed them! The quality of the sound is excellent. It is turly hard to believe it comes from such a small device. The integrated cover/stand works very well. The unit is satisfyingly heavy and is quite stable. I get very good Bluetooth range (30+ feet). All in all, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaLawyer

customer_reviews.title: Picky Husband Loves Music
customer_reviews.text: I have a husband for whom I rarely "guess" gifts for; things in our home take months of research before moving forward with final purchasing decisions. My father has this speaker and we use it frequently while at the cabin. It's a great device that anyone in our group with Bluetooth can link to so we can share music from all of our devices. It was a no-brainer for us to purchase one for the home and this was his Christmas gift this year. We've already used it several times, particularly during parties! I even heard him say "This was a great idea, thanks honey!" *GASP* I may be getting better at this gift purchasing thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Porch

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Bluetooth connection remains stable. I have yet to hear any audible clipping / signal loss. After a few minutes of standby (no music playing etc), the unit turns off bluetooth automatically. If you press the bluetooth button, it will automatically sync with your phone again. Sound is clear, loud and has a little bass to it. I'm no audio professional but for the average ears this thing sounds amazing.Thus far it works flawlessly with my Iphone. Recommend buy for those seeking a portable bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: boomh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY BOSE MOBILE SPEAKER !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THANK,S AGAIN AMAZON , LOVE THE SOUND THAT COMES OUT OF THIS SMALL SPEAKER CLEAR BASS LOVE THAT I CAN TAKE IT WITH ME TO MY NEW JOB LIKE THE 8 HOUR,S OF PLAY & THAT,S ITS BLUE TOOTH WORK,S GREAT WITH ALL MY TABLET,S AND HTC SMART PHONE. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND BOSE PRODUCT,S WORTH EVERY DOLLAR HAVE THE IE2 IN THE EAR OVER THE EAR HEAD PHONES AGAIN, THEIR WORTH IT EVEN HAVE THE OLD BOSE 100 SERIES HOME SPEAKERS AND THEY STILL WORK GREAT. SINCERELY MILTON ALEMAN LOVE BOSE PRODUCT,S
customer_reviews.author: milton aleman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound in a compact and elegant package!
customer_reviews.text: Many audiophiles claim to dislike Bose... probably because of the proprietary technology that control their ability to fiddle around. But again, those audiophiles would rather drop dead than subject their music to Bluetooth. This product is so easy to use and very elegant in its Zen design simplicity. For that matter it suits perfectly any Apple product, of course (thank you Steve!). It delivers an impressive bass response. I use it mostly with iTunes. Keep in mind, iTunes is provided with an EQUALIZER (command + option + 2) so you have the opportunity to tailor the sound to your personal preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Christophe Frochaux

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: A true test was with Spotify Premium quality audio. The sound is awesome. Period. And the sound quality on Spotify was noticeably better when I went from high quality to "extreme" quality with Premium. Sound volume also is all I could ask for. This is not a loudspeaker designed to fill a stadium or drive the neighbors crazy, but it does go to just below painful and still sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: David Spielberg

customer_reviews.title: Best sound & EASY to link
customer_reviews.text: I did consider cheaper speakers to play Pandora/satellite music; however, I selected Bose based on their quality of speakers that I already own. I LOVE this speaker!!! I have used it for outside parties, at work in my office, and at home. The device easily links via Bluetooth with my android phone and my ipad. I even have it packed to take on an out of town business trip so i can listen at the hotel. I highly recoimmend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this speaker is awesome, exactly what you would expect from Bose. Being mobile is a great plus, and the battery life is longer than I would typically use in one sitting; I charge it between uses so its always ready to go. Only weird thing is switching between different bluetooth devices- the iPad2 sometimes needs to fully re-pair with it, and it sometimes just does not want to connect to my Android phone. Also- I wish it had a remote to turn it on, or if I could do that via bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Slushpupie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: I read somewhere that this model has too much bass. I think that if you're looking for a quality product, you cannot go wrong with a Bose product. I use this one with my laptop and I-phone and have added a little more bass using the EQ in the phone. The battery lasted somewhere around 8 hours for me. The blue tooth option is easy and works great. If you're sitting on the fence about whether or not to make this purchase...just do it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: For the money you would expect not only superior sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For the money you would expect not only superior sound quality, but durability. With this particular unit I got neither, as it both sounded muddy and boomy but I also blew a speaker on low volumes. If you really want a nice portable speaker there are PLENTY of better options for 1/3 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lexalotacus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant about this purchase because of the steep price, but I'm really glad I got it. The sound quality is perfect, the volume has great range, the bluetooth setup was super easy (just a press of one button and it was automatically detected by my iPhone), and I love it's portability - it's great if you like listening to the news in the morning while showering/getting ready in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Much appreciated gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought the initial Bose SoundLink for my husband's birthday for it's mobility and of course, the Bose sound, and we were both very happy with the product. When my sister experienced it at our house at Thanksgiving and loved it, I knew just what we would get her for Christmas! The new wrap around case is nice. She was excited to receive it and will use it with her iPad. She's had it at home now for a few days and LOVES it! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this months ago!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is outstanding. I use it everyday to play music from my iPad via Bluetooth. Very portable with great battery life. I've been averaging almost 8 hours on a charge. What amazes me the most is how great it sounds outside. I had it on our patio table during a recent birthday party and people couldn't believe all that sound was coming from a single speaker.
customer_reviews.author: J Cissell

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound but no EQ?
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and portable and was easy to pair with my phone. The sound fills up a room. It's great when I'm cleaning the house and can just move it into the room I'm working on, or if I want to bring it outside while I'm grilling. It gets decently loud without any distortion, and the folded back cover works well so that it never rattles the surface it's on. My only criticism is that it doesn't have its own equalizer, so the sound is a little too bass for my preference. However, that is easily fixed with the EQ on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sauri

customer_reviews.title: A little dissapointed to be a Bose
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this one. After receiving it, and playing several song from my MP3 player, it just didn't thrill me the way some Bose products can. First its not a crisp sound. There is no treble or bass setting, so it sounds kinda muffled to me. Had planned to send it back the next day, but my family convinced me otherwise. MAJOR selling point is that it IS portable. and we will probably use it most when camping or boating. Really expected more from Bose!!! :(
customer_reviews.author: tim spencer

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Fills the room with quality sound. I've had mine for years. Use where you don't have wired sound. Love this with my iPhone and apple music. Take it were ever you are. If you don't have blue tooth in your car or truck take this with you. Many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great sound...as usual
customer_reviews.text: I own a Bose 5.1 surround system. computer speakers and a Wave radio already. This purchase surpassed my expectations. Packaging was done well. Instructions were easy to follow. Bluetooth pairing couldn't have been simpler. All these kudos notwithstanding, the sound from the unit is magnificent. Bass is quite remarkable as is the balance of the range. Glad I purchased this unit and hope to have many hours of enjoyment. I recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sloan

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing for a small speaker. No distortion at high volumes. Looks great, sounds great and is very easy to set up to any Bluetooth enabled device regardless of manufacturer. Read many reviews and Bose is still the best around for sound and quality. May cost more but it is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. The sound from it is awesome. We carry it everywhere. On vacation, on the boat, in the jacuzzi. Of course it has the great Bose sound. Love the cover that stays on and turns into the stand. You don't have to have a loose cover that you are always looking for. Very please with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: One of the most useful items I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how much I needed a Bluetooth speaker. I use them everyday. People are amazed at the sound quality of these speakers. The battery life is around 7-8 of continuous use. They are not the cheapest speakers but they are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeskiska

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and bluethoot connectivity problems
customer_reviews.text: The speaker itself has the expected sound but the battery doesn't last at all, I don't know if mine was faulty but the battery can't even last for 30 minutes of normal playing. It's a challenge connecting the divices for the first time too. Very sad experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thierno Nassirou Diallo

customer_reviews.title: BOSE is BOMB
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular when it comes to audio and sound quality in products, specifically headphones and speakers. I also don't feel inclined to do Amazon reviews very often. This product is simple to use, has great sound quality and has far superior lows than other mobile speakers such as the pill or jambox. Definitely beats the competition out of the water. If you want to spend a little more, you are getting what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: B-Wise

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just wish there was a remote, and that you don't have to disable Bluetooth on one device to play from another on the speaker. But the sound is great and love that the cover comes attached to it. The delivery was fast and the product was as described. Overall very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Yapsters

customer_reviews.title: The usual BOSE high quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews before ordering this unit. Considered buying a cheaper brand but always knew BOSE was a leader in sound quality. I wasn't disappointed. I was amazed by the amount of sound this little unit can pump out. No issues pairing via bluetooth with my LG Smartphone or my wife's I-phone. Pretty straight forward
customer_reviews.author: Wado

customer_reviews.title: Liked mine so well that . . .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as a gift. I have had mine for over a year and fell in love with it. I don't know what the difference is between this Nylon Bose SoundLink Bluetooth Mobile Speaker II and the Soundlink III, but this one is cheaper and am sure is just as good as the SL III. If anyone can tell me the difference, please comment.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Almighty

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: If you like bose speakers this is a no brainer. I bought this for work. But find myself listening to this more at home. Have not turned my Hi Fi system on since the little speaker has arrived. Put this speaker in the corner and it just fills the room with amazing sound. The bathroom is where this speaker shines. If you want all around sound performance and quality second to none buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S. McCarvey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect purchase. The setup is simple and idiot proof. You will be enjoying outrageous sound within five minutes from opening the box. It is exactly what they say it is.... what a pleasant surprise. I'd give it 6 stars if I could. LOVE IT! I loved it so much that I went to the Bose web-site and purchased a wave radio and CD changer. BUY this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: There are definitely cheaper solutions but the sound quality is good for a bluetooth speaker. The battery life is good, getting about six hours at medium volume. Bass is not as pronounced as I expected but acceptable for a small speaker. One big disappointment was the lack of any transport control buttons (play,pause,skip) which I have seen on other systems. Overall, I am happy with this item and have enjoyed having music in places I had not before.
customer_reviews.author: Deere in headlights

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for a Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband about 8 months ago, and we use it all of the time. We typically sync our iPad to it and play Pandora, and the sound is great. It holds charge for about 3 to 4 hours before it needs to be plugged in. It's also fun to have around so that friends can sync their devices as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer De Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: What you would expect from Bose. Great sound and portability. The only downside I discovered it that once fully charged, it will not maintain its charge for a long time even though it's not being used. If you you remember to charge the unit before using it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jfhnhh

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, No Cover
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is unsurpassed! It is very much what I expected. The only detail that I expected to see but did not, was a simple, soft fabric cover with a drawstring closure. While I realize cases are sold separately, for the money I invested, I expected to at least get a dust cover. Since this is a piece of equipment characterized as "mobile," it should have come with something to protect it in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Judyann Wehking

customer_reviews.title: A must must have!!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a remote country area and always had Sirius XM. We upgraded to smartphones and vehicles with Bluetooth in the last year and have found Pandora to be perfect for us. The sound quality of the Bose Soundlink is far superior to other speakers in this price range. It is worth it. We spent on the speaker less than one year subscription to Sirius XM.
customer_reviews.author: SJCJ

customer_reviews.title: Lives up tot he Bose reputation
customer_reviews.text: If you want excellent sound from a Bluetooth speaker it is hard to beat the SoundLink. I bought it for my wife for Chirstmas and she loves it. It is small enough for her to use around the house or in her office. It was VERY easy to set up with her iPad and iPhone. It seems ot have very good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: TedW

customer_reviews.title: They won’t disappoint!!
customer_reviews.text: Third one I’ve bought! These are phenomenal! Battery life is long; Crisp sound you expect from Bose!
customer_reviews.author: mysticnewyork

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Charger!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is fine but got the wrong charger so I can't charge it very well. I will have get the right one now!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I've had it only for about a month now but it seems to be working great. Sound quality is excellent and it pairs very quickly. Construction is very sturdy. I don't miss the speakerphone. Nor do I miss any remote - the volume control on my iPhone and iPad has had plenty of range to work with for me. As great as it is, I think $300 would be the max that I would pay for it - it is obviously pretty expensive.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Excellent as expected
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not what i was expected. I was told that battery life would be 8hrs play after full charge. Well it turned out that was not true at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say. This little package blows away the competition. I had a similar Sony unit that I returned due to many linking problems and drop outs. No problem with the Bose! And it sounds great! I can have the source (iPad, etc.) much further away than the specified 30 feet and still no drop outs.
customer_reviews.author: bobcat_66

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Best money I've spent in awhile! Wireless blue tooth makes this speaker very versatile, we take it with us everywhere and play it off on of our cell phones. Enough power to play at the pool and still have good sound, great sound indoors. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: D Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent purchase! The sound quality is amazing, easy to connect to any bluetooth device, the battery plays for a good time and is very portable. It's a bit heavy but do you have to be in mind that you are carrying a sound box made of magnets! Perfect for small reunions, for travels and I even take it to the beach. And it looks very nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus B.

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all
customer_reviews.text: Bose is a name synonymous with quality. This speaker has been excellent. I have owned it for about 2 years and it is working as well as it did the day I bought it. Bose produces excellent products and this bluetooth speaker is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: BamaJD1

customer_reviews.title: GREAT speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! Our old BOSE finally bit the dust after 10yrs and this is the replacement. The sound is awesome and the Bluetooth technology is great. The only problem is that with the earlier versions of the iPhone it sometimes drops the song or skips in and out. No problem on the latest versions.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHoney

customer_reviews.title: bought four of these for all family presents. Who ...
customer_reviews.text: bought four of these for all family presents. Who needs huge ones when this has HUGE sound! Can Bose customer support is out of the world.
customer_reviews.author: dag

customer_reviews.title: it didn't work at all. But, Amazon was ...
customer_reviews.text: it didn't work at all. But , Amazon was proficient in working me thru the matter.
customer_reviews.author: eric woriax

customer_reviews.title: Superb performance
customer_reviews.text: This model has excellent sound! Both in terms of low frequency Bass and high range Treble. It is well worth the money when compared with the other Bluetooth speakers on the market. The battery runs for hour on end as specified by the manufacturer. Strongly recommend this model over others and even perhaps the new slim model from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. Kadri

customer_reviews.title: Rich and powerful range of sound.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just simply amazing. It gives out a full powerful sound. You can literally feel the vibration of air just like standing next to a large speaker many times it's size but yet the music quality is tight. Bluetooth connection is so easy. The only small negative for me is perhaps the design. For such quality brand name like Bose, and the premium price, the product design could be a little more stylish. It looks a bit dated. Other than that I would recommend this to anyone who appreciates the sound quality of their music on the go.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL CHAN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. great volume, having a battery is great so I Can move it around. definitively a buy! I can have 3 devices paired to this device via Bluetooth. Needless t say, the sound quality is really good!
customer_reviews.author: trukis

customer_reviews.title: outstanding portable bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audio aficianado, but I've owned many speakers since my first Wharfdales in the 60s, and these portable little wonders are right up there. Experts may cavil, no doubt justly, but to the non-audiophile music-lover who values extreme portability and simplicity, these speakers are everything you're hopig for.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey vincent

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars If I Could
customer_reviews.text: This is the best speaker ever, I just hook it up with my IPod or IPhone and play my downloaded music. The sound is fabulous, although you cannot change the bass or treble the sound is unbelievable. I love that it's the size of a book and can go anywhere. I also purchased one for each of my sons (3) and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Klopec

customer_reviews.title: Even though this is a Bose system when I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is a Bose system when I bought it I did not realize it was a used one. There were major to minor scratches on the unit and it also had button issues.
customer_reviews.author: aceman1946

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Sound!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. I started listening to music as soon as it came out of the box. It's very convenient. I like being able to take it everywhere. Works well with iPad. Sometimes it hesitates with the laptop. I highly recommend this speaker. I think it may be the most reasonably priced Bose I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound output for the size! If you can afford the price I would highly recommend this great little speaker. Don't let its size fool you. It will easily fill a large room with rich sounding music. I was looking for a Bluetooth speaker my fiancée and I could share around the house or on trips. A speaker that would interface with our laptops, smartphones, my Microsoft Surface tablet and my Google Nexus 7 tablet. This speaker hasn't missed a beat. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: On 10 point scales: Sound 10/10, bluetooth streaming reliability 10/10, battery life 10/10, build quality 10/10, ease of setup and use 10/10. If you want awesome sound and uncompromising quality, this is absolutely the product I recommend for a bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: wade black

product_meta.title: SoundLink Bluetooth Mobile Speaker II - Nylon (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Style:Nylon| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingYou've got your music on your phone, and you're ready to play. Enjoy deeper, more powerful sound than you thought possible from a speaker this small. The SoundLink Bluetooth Mobile speaker II works wirelessly with Apple, Android and BlackBerry devices, or your tablet or laptop - and goes wherever you do for music when you want, where you want.
feature_bullets: Compact portable speaker for music anywhere
Sound performance unlike any other mobile speaker
Wireless connects to your Bluetooth devices
Rechargeable battery plays up to 8 hours

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,036 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #2,937 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#22,302 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
specifications.Included Components: SoundLink Bluetooth speaker III Wall charger
